sentences.sContent: It must be one of those soccer scarfs from England.
sentences.sContent_eng: It must be one of those soccer scarfs from England.
sentences.sCn: 那一定是某个英国足球队的围巾。

phrases.pCn: n. 足球妈妈；非常重视小孩休闲活动，亲自开车接送小孩参加运动，活动的母亲

trans.tranOther: a sport played by two teams of 11 players, who try to kick a round ball into their opponents’  goal
